GP12agp_bi_u:30536: yathā cāhaṃ cirāyuḥsthāṃ kuryāṃ tathā mahattapaḥ //AP_*6.023cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:30547: evaṃ matimahāvuddhe kiṃ tvaṃ karma cikīrṣasi //AP_*6.028ef/
GP12agp_bi_u:30548: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca bhūtāpahāriṇaṃ mṛtyuṃ jetumicchāmi sāmprataṃ /AP_*6.029ab/
GP12agp_bi_u:30553: gurur uvāca nārāyaṇamanabhyarcya tapasā manasā suta /AP_*6.030ab/
GP12agp_bi_u:30554: ko jetuṃ śaknuyān mṛtyuṃ tatastaṃ tapasārcaya //AP_*6.030cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:30556: bhaktapriyaṃ suraśreṣṭhaṃ bhaktyā taṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja //AP_*6.031cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:30563: tasmāt tvaṃ lokakartāraṃ viṣṇuṃ jiṣṇuṃ śriyaḥpatiṃ /AP_*6.035ab/
GP12agp_bi_u:30564: govindaṃ gopatiṃ devaṃ satataṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja //AP_*6.035cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:30566: vatsa jetāsi mṛtyuṃ tvaṃ sasainyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ //AP_*6.036cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:30567: vyāsa uvāca uktaḥ pitāmahenaivaṃ bhṛguṇātha tamabravīt /AP_*6.037ab/
GP12agp_bi_u:30570: ārādhitaś ca bhagavān mama mṛtyuṃ harediti //AP_*6.038cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:30573: bhṛgur uvāca tuṅgā ca bhaginī bhadrā dve nadyau mantrasambhave /AP_*6.040ab/
